The left: leaning advocacy group MoveOn.org targeted Sen. John McCain in an email list of "10 things you should know about John McCain (but probably don't)," which included the claim about his rating as the worst senator in Congress for children.
The Children: s Defense Fund did rate McCain as the worst senator in Congress for children in 2007, with a score of 10 percent on their scorecard.
McCain: s vote against SCHIP was based on his concerns about spending and the lack of adequate provisions for paying for the expansion.
